blog.name: sassyharryquotes
blog.title: No, the Books are Better
blog.description: Quotes from Harry Potter, expanding from what is in the books to “what could have been”s

tags: sirius is not just a playboy or lupin’s lover
body:
Through the Veil

Sirius Black did not mean to die that night. Of course he knew he was risking his life if he went on the mission, but he had risked his life so many times, it kind of lost meaning after a while.

Sirius Black had felt alive that night. Finally out of Grimmauld Place, he was doing what he was born to do: fight. He was fighting for his godson, his dead brother, his lost friends, for the better world he dreamt of before the dementors had sucked his happiness out.

Sirius Black was afraid. His cousin Bellatrix was not an easy contender, and he knew in his heart that being related would only make this a harder fight. He was not willing to kill, but had no doubt that Bella would.

Sirius Black laughed loudly. It was his coping mechanism, to laugh in the darkest of times. To humor his way out of trouble. It is not surprising that he died as he lived, with an easy, exhilarated smile on his face.

Sirius Black fell through the veil. He did not hear the last words from Bellatrix’s mouth, nor did he see the green light. He was falling, falling, falling, through the air, and through the veil. Once he hit the veil he braced himself for the hard floor.

Sirius Black landed comfortably. He was in the arms of-who else?- James Potter. The messy black hair, the easy smile that mirrored his own, the hazel eyes he knew so well was exactly as he remembered, and also exactly as how he had first seen them when they were eleven-year-olds on the Hogwarts Express.

Sirius Black wept. Standing next to James, they saw what was happening beyond the veil. His sweet godson was running towards him. How he wanted to reach out and greet him, but Sirius already knew the veil was a one-way entry. His promises of taking place of Lily and James, of being there as a friend, a guardian, a confidante burned his eyes, squeezed his heart, and became a hot lump in his throat. In the arms of his long lost friend, Sirius Black wept.

tags: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
summary: If a drarry fanfic doesn't make the shift in dynamic natural then I'm not going to read it. Enemies don't go from hating each...
body:
If a drarry fanfic doesn’t make the shift in dynamic natural then I’m not going to read it. Enemies don’t go from hating each other to being friendly. Something has to push that.

They can’t just pretend Draco wasn’t a little asshole to Harry and his friends. Draco said and did horrible mean things and it isn’t something that’s just forgotten. Yes, Draco changed but he’s still responsible for the little shit he was as a child and his behavior during those years. It doesn’t matter if you’re making it out be the whole ‘he bullied them because he loved Harry’ trope, that’s toxic shit and he would have been stupid as fuck.

But it also can’t have Draco being too polite. He wasn’t raised to be polite to people like Harry or Harry’s friends. It’s a new concept. He isn’t a 'nice’ person. He isn’t soft or warm or open or friendly. Draco Malfoy is introverted and snarky and sarcastic, even to his friends.

If his character in the fanfiction wouldnt line up to his character in the books, I just don’t like it as much.

summary: Look i fucking get it. I may be gay but im also white and a man and grew up in texas. There are plenty of "progressive " ideas i...
body:
Look i fucking get it. I may be gay but im also white and a man and grew up in texas. There are plenty of “progressive ” ideas i thought were bullshit or didnt agree with. But heres the thing. If it doesnt affect you or you arent an authority on the subject the you arent ALLOWED an opinion (for example.a straight professor whos been working with queer history and has the culminated knowledge of thousands of gay and trans and other queer ppl knows more about being gay than a 17 yr old gay person)

Thats just how reality works. Doctors, nurses and med students can have an opinion on surgery operations. Someone who has to have surgery can have an opinion. IF ASKED a friend or relative can give an opinion focusing on other factors (“its not happening to me but you should go with tje safer option even though its slower because we can help you through it”)

My ppint is even if ypu are SURE you are right if its NONE of your business just shut up about it. Like i said i still have negative opinions about some Progressive stuff. But im not an ass. I realize i have no idea what im talking about. But i still feel that way. So while i dont be an ASS and write think pieces on how the oppressed should Get Over It….i just…dont reblog those opinions. I dont follow those ppl. If i REALLY feel this way choosing to not Promote the idea is far different than going on the offensive.

So unless you are speaking on behalf of non present minorities using examples and logic you got from THEM….

Shut the fuck up if it doesnt effect you

blog.name: cheekybluefox
blog.title: Slytherin Squad
blog.description: Just a twenty five year old trying and failing to adult

body:
SlytherPuff #4

I can be mean. He can be nice.

I’m cautious of people. He sees the good in people.

I can be faraway in my own head, but he’s always there.

I can be my own worst enemy, but luckily, he’s my best friend.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: corvidaezero

summary: Given all the horrible "canon" that JK Rowling has tweeted over the years, are we sure she actually wrote the original Harry...
body:
Given all the horrible “canon” that JK Rowling has tweeted over the years, are we sure she actually wrote the original Harry Potter books.

Like, maybe her grandmother wrote them all a long time ago, but then died. And when she was cleaning out her grandmother’s house, Joanne found all the pages to all the books, and she published them herself.

And now that her grandmother’s original material is all gone, JK is trying to continue with the universe, but obviously can’t hold a candle to her grandmother, the actual author, so it’s all just offensive and plot-holey garbage.

JK had been running one of the longest cons in history. Well, not anymore. I’m on to you, Joanne.

Given all the horrible “canon” that JK Rowling has tweeted over the years, are we sure she actually wrote the original Harry Potter books.

Like, maybe her grandmother wrote them all a long time ago, but then died. And when she was cleaning out her grandmother’s house, Joanne found all the pages to all the books, and she published them herself.

And now that her grandmother’s original material is all gone, JK is trying to continue with the universe, but obviously can’t hold a candle to her grandmother, the actual author, so it’s all just offensive and plot-holey garbage.

JK had been running one of the longest cons in history. Well, not anymore. I’m on to you, Joanne.
